game.name: Kinsfolk
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 갓 아빠가 된 아버지의 눈을 통해 가족의 의미를 탐구합니다. 그가 어린 시절 겪었던 어려움, 그것이 아버지와의 관계에 어떤 영향을 미쳤는지, 그리고 그것이 그가 어떤 아버지가 될지 어떻게 형성할지 살펴봅니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short, atmospheric narrative adventure about fatherhood, memory, and healing. Explore a beautiful world, relive pivotal moments from a new father’s past, and see how they shape the parent he chooses to become.

reviewHighlights.text: Kinsfolk is a slow, gentle, and reflective journey about a man travelling to see his father with his young baby in tow. It’s a classic walking simulat...
[i]Kinsfolk[/i] is one of those rare games that doesn’t just tell a story. It makes you really *feel* it with every fiber of your being. It’s an inten...
